text: Last week on MasterChef Australia.

Callum faced off against celebrity chef Philippa Sibley.
One of the best things I've ever done.

I am proud with what I've done.
Tonight, 20 amateurs begin the week thinking outside the square.
What dark horrors lie inside the mystery box today?
Then, they face the invention test.

I don't like it.

one hundred thousand dollars to make their culinary dreams reality,
and the title of Australia's next MasterChef.

forget about the challenge, first things first, Courtney's 30th birthday.

And turning 30, I guess it's a good point to say,
now's the time to move on with something new.
Welcome back to the MasterChef kitchen.
You're standing in front of a little box.

to reproduce a dish, but to create a dish from what's inside there,
that's the true test of a good cook.
